about.title: about the company
about.text: This is a unique enterprise that carries out the entire production cycle from growing fine-fiber cotton to producing finished textile products at its own facilities.
about.text2: Our company is a leader in Uzbekistan's textile industry, and our in-house production enables us to offer our partners a wide range of finished products with diverse models and color options.

el1.title: Fabric
el1.description: Fabric is an important material used in various fields, including fashion, home décor, industry, and more. It can be made from a variety of fibers, both natural and synthetic.

el2.title: Bedding
el2.description: Bedding is an important material used in various fields, including fashion, home décor, industry, and more. It can be made from a variety of fibers, both natural and synthetic.

el3.title: Home Textile
el3.description: Home textile is an important material used in various fields, including fashion, home décor, industry, and more. It can be made from a variety of fibers, both natural and synthetic.

lelitAd.desc: The Lelit Home Textile brand was launched in 2021. It is a home textile brand that combines elegance, comfort, and quality.

opportunities.title: Benefits of Cooperation
opportunities.desc: A textile factory is an enterprise engaged in the production of textile products from fibers and threads. The main activity of such factories includes the manufacture of fabrics.

op1.title: Wide Range
op1.desc: Cotton fabric with twill weave and soft one- or two-sided even sparse nap. Soft and gentle material, does not irritate the skin, absorbs moisture well and retains heat. Used for children's clothing, shirts, pajamas, bathrobes, lining fabric, etc.

op2.title: Flexible Cooperation Terms
op2.desc: Cotton fabric with twill weave and soft one- or two-sided even sparse nap. Soft and gentle material, does not irritate the skin, absorbs moisture well and retains heat. Used for children's clothing, shirts, pajamas, bathrobes, lining fabric, etc.

op3.title: Competitive Prices
op3.desc: Cotton fabric with twill weave and soft one- or two-sided even sparse nap. Soft and gentle material, does not irritate the skin, absorbs moisture well and retains heat. Used for children's clothing, shirts, pajamas, bathrobes, lining fabric, etc.

advantages.title: OUR ADVANTAGES
advantages.subtitle: We have high-tech equipment that allows us to produce a wide range of fabrics most in demand on the market and according to consumer needs. We create unique conditions for you and your business.

item1.title: We are a Manufacturer
item1.text: A unique enterprise where production is established from growing high-quality cotton and processing it to finished textile products, allowing us to control product quality at every stage of production.

item2.title: Capabilities
item2.text: High-tech production allows the manufacture of high-quality products that meet your requirements.

item3.title: Continuous Development
item3.text: We never settle for what we’ve achieved because improvement and increasing production efficiency is an endless and exciting process.
